EmailTemplate.name: Whitepaper - Conquer SAP Testing - June 2015.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Conquer SAP Testing with Tosca Testsuite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Conquer SAP Testing with Tosca Testsuite
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Let’s be honest. Testing your SAP system is an overwhelming task.
Read our white paper on how to Conquer SAP Testing with Tosca Testsuite <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/slide-conquer-sap-testing?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>.
As much as SAP Fiori and SAP HANA provide awesome benefits, they also increase the need for testing, creating a manual testing bottleneck that delays deployments and stretches budgets.
The good news is that you aren’t the first to encounter this problem – and Tricentis has already actively developed Tosca Testsuite into a solution for your SAP testing headaches.
Tricentis’ “Conquer SAP Testing with Tosca Testsuite <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/slide-conquer-sap-testing?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>” white paper takes an in-depth look at how Tosca Testsuite can help you optimize your risk coverage, reduce and manage your test case portfolio, and automate your SAP internal tests.
Click here <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/slide-conquer-sap-testing?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> to download the free white paper “Conquer SAP Testing with Tosca Testsuite”!
Best regards, The Tricentis Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/slide-conquer-sap-testing?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/slide-conquer-sap-testing?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
